gd656killicon.client.format.destroy_vehi: You used <weapon> to destroy enemy armor <target>
gd656killicon.client.format.preset_00006: You used <weapon> to destroy enemy armor <target>
gd656killicon.client.gui.config.title: GD656Killicon Control Panel
gd656killicon.client.gui.config.subtitle: By Minecraft_GD656
gd656killicon.client.gui.hometab.title: §lGD656Killicon
gd656killicon.client.gui.hometab.mod.tac: Provides support for headshot detection and bonuses like 'Last Round'.
gd656killicon.client.gui.hometab.mod.sbw: Provides support for headshot detection, vehicle damage, vehicle destruction, vehicle repair, high-value target destruction, and other bonuses.
gd656killicon.client.gui.hometab.mod.ywz: Provides support for vehicle damage, vehicle destruction, vehicle repair, high-value target destruction, and other bonuses.
Provides support for vehicle damage, vehicle destruction, high-value target destruction, and other bonuses.
gd656killicon.client.gui.hometab.mod.spo: Provides support for spotting marks, marked kills, and marked squad assist bonuses.
gd656killicon.client.gui.hometab.mod.pin: Provides support for spotting marks, marked kills, and marked squad assist bonuses.
Provides an extension for flashbang effects to enable the 'Blindfire' bonus detection.
gd656killicon.client.gui.help.area3.desc:
This is the navigation area for mod help information. Use the list on the right to view detailed server commands, bonus descriptions, and preset system tutorials.
    Some content requires
      -TACZ Timeless and Classics: Zero
      -SBW Superior Battlefield Warfare
      -YWZJ Never Ending: Vehicles
      -IA Immersive Aircraft
      -LR Tactical Workshop
    to function properly.

    Documentation last updated: 2026-02-23

    Join QQ Group: 1033096961 to ask the author questions directly or report mod issues.
Dynamically change card style based on team color
gd656killicon.client.gui.config.preset.c: Configure sounds for the current preset
gd656killicon.client.gui.config.preset.n: You haven't added any elements yet
gd656killicon.client.gui.config.global.e: If enabled, specific sounds will play when kill icons appear.
gd656killicon.client.gui.config.global.d: If enabled, TACZ kill sounds will be suppressed.
gd656killicon.client.gui.config.global.e: If enabled, when a bonus (e.g., headshot, assist) is triggered, detailed information will be shown in the chat.
If enabled, simulates lag (FPS drop, brief freeze) during intense combat.
gd656killicon.client.gui.config.global.a: Set the intensity and frequency of lag simulation (1-100). Higher values mean more frequent and severe lag.
gd656killicon.client.gui.config.preset.h: This preset has no elements. Hover over the right edge of the screen to open the element control panel.
gd656killicon.client.gui.prompt.language: Detected a client language change. Consider resetting text format configuration items.
gd656killicon.client.gui.prompt.ace_lag_: High values may make the game unplayable. Confirm the change?
gd656killicon.client.gui.prompt.config_i: Thanks for installing GD656Killicon. Tips will guide you as you go.
Use the top tabs to switch quickly. Icon settings are in “Preset Elements”.
This is the home page: check integrations and install status, and use the bottom-right links to open websites.
gd656killicon.client.gui.prompt.preset_i: This is the preset elements page. Open the left preset panel or the right element panel to configure items and sounds.
gd656killicon.client.gui.prompt.element_: This is the element config page. Left preview updates live; right side adjusts multiple settings.
For non-subtitle elements, use the upper-right sub-tabs and drop PNG/GIF to customize textures or animations.
gd656killicon.client.gui.prompt.sound_in: This is the sound configuration page. Select a sound to preview it or click the gray file name to change audio.
gd656killicon.client.gui.prompt.sound_se: Please choose an official sound or drag an OGG or WAV file into the game window to customize audio.
gd656killicon.client.gui.prompt.scoreboa: This is the scoreboard page: left records career stats, right shows server scores and KDA. Click header L/R to sort.
gd656killicon.client.gui.prompt.sound_re: Please select a sound from the list to replace
Only OGG or WAV audio files are supported
gd656killicon.client.gui.prompt.texture_: Please drop PNG or GIF files in the texture configuration tab to customize textures
Only standard PNG or GIF files are supported
gd656killicon.client.command.iamanew: New user mode enabled. Tips will show again.
gd656killicon.server.command.score_reset: Reset all recorded player scores to %d
gd656killicon.server.command.kill_reset_: Reset all recorded player kills to %d
gd656killicon.server.command.death_reset: Reset all recorded player deaths to %d
gd656killicon.server.command.assist_rese: Reset all recorded player assists to %d
gd656killicon.client.config.export.succe: Preset exported as %s.gdpack. The exported file is located in the 'config/gd656killicon/export' folder in your game directory. You can share this file directly with others. Dragging the file into the preset element configuration window will allow them to experience your preset.
gd656killicon.client.config.import.dupli: Preset ID %s already exists. Please create a new ID.
gd656killicon.client.config.import.inval: Invalid file format. Please use .gdpack or .zip.
gd656killicon.client.config.element.dele: Cannot delete old configuration file. Please check if the file is in use.
Cannot delete old configuration file. Please check if the file is in use.
gd656killicon.client.config.element.inva: Invalid color code: %s. Must be hexadecimal format (e.g., #ff0000ff)
Possible reason: Key name missing quotes or using illegal characters
gd656killicon.client.config.element.load: Configuration load failed: JSON format error
gd656killicon.client.config.element.miss: Possible reason: Missing closing brace } or comma ,
gd656killicon.client.config.element.pres: Preset %s is empty, no need to reset
gd656killicon.client.config.element.rese: Element configuration for preset %s restored from official preset
No changes needed for element configuration of preset %s
Element configuration for preset %s reset to safe defaults
gd656killicon.client.config.save_fail: Failed to save global configuration file: %s
gd656killicon.client.sound.reload_succes: Sound reload complete. Current preset (%s) loaded %d external sounds.
gd656killicon.client.gui.config.sound.se: Please select a sound to modify
gd656killicon.client.texture.reload_succ: Texture reload complete. Current preset (%s) loaded %d external textures.
gd656killicon.client.combo.config_error: Combo icon config parsing error, using defaults
gd656killicon.client.score_subtitle.conf: Score subtitle config parsing error, using defaults
gd656killicon.client.scrolling.config_er: Scrolling icon config parsing error, using defaults
gd656killicon.client.subtitle.config_err: Kill subtitle config parsing error, using defaults
gd656killicon.config.desc.reset_kill_com: Choose the condition for resetting the kill streak.
gd656killicon.config.desc.reset_assist_c: Choose the condition for resetting the assist streak.
gd656killicon.config.desc.combo_reset_ti: When 'Custom Duration' is selected, the streak resets after this many seconds without a kill/assist.
gd656killicon.config.desc.enable_light_e: Enable a light sweep effect when subtitles enter.
gd656killicon.config.desc.texture_style: Select the official texture file used in this tab.
gd656killicon.config.desc.official_textu: Select the official texture file used in this tab.
gd656killicon.config.desc.custom_texture: Select the custom texture file used in this tab.
gd656killicon.config.desc.texture_select: Choose which texture source to use.
gd656killicon.client.gui.prompt.texture_: Texture binding changed. Reset animation settings?
Texture binding changed. Reconfigure animation settings?
gd656killicon.config.desc.color_normal_t: Set the color for regular (non-placeholder) text in subtitles.
gd656killicon.client.gui.help.command.bo:
/gd656killicon server bonus turnon <all|type>
Enable all or a specific bonus type.

/gd656killicon server bonus turnoff <all|type>
Disable all or a specific bonus type.

/gd656killicon server bonus edit <type> expression <expr>
Modify the score calculation expression for a specific bonus.
gd656killicon.client.gui.help.command.re:
/gd656killicon server reset config
Reset server general configuration to defaults.

/gd656killicon server reset bonus
Reset all bonus configurations to defaults.
gd656killicon.client.gui.help.command.co:
/gd656killicon server config ComboWindow <sec>
Set the combo window duration in seconds.

/gd656killicon server config ScoreMaxLimit <val>
Set the maximum value for score transfer.

/gd656killicon server config [Type]Displayname <name>
Set the display name for various leaderboards (supports Score, Kill, Death, Assist).
gd656killicon.client.gui.help.command.st:
/gd656killicon server statistics get <type> [target]
Get data for a target or yourself.

/gd656killicon server statistics list <type>
List the leaderboard for a specific data type.

/gd656killicon server statistics add/set <type> <targets> <amt>
Add to or set player data (requires permission).

/gd656killicon server statistics dataset <type> <amt>
Reset all players' data to a specified value (requires permission).
gd656killicon.client.gui.help.command.de:
/gd656killicon server debug scoreboarddebug <count>
Generate a specified number of random scoreboard entries for testing.
gd656killicon.client.gui.help.preset.int: This mod is based on a preset system, allowing users to save and switch between different UI configuration schemes. Each preset contains an independent set of element layouts, textures, and sound settings. The mod includes several official presets, and you can also create your own custom presets.
gd656killicon.client.gui.help.preset.sel: Open the in-game configuration interface, hover your mouse over the leftmost edge of the game window to reveal the left sidebar. In the preset list on the left, click on a preset's ID (e.g., 00001) to switch to that preset. The currently selected preset ID will be highlighted.
gd656killicon.client.gui.help.preset.cre: Click the 'Create New Custom Preset' button at the bottom of the list. The system will automatically generate a new preset ID and select it. You can then personalize it.
gd656killicon.client.gui.help.preset.edi:
Click 'Enter Preset Edit Mode':
1. For custom presets: Hover over the ID to choose Edit ID or Delete Preset; hover over the name to choose Rename.
2. For official presets: Hover over the ID to choose Reset Config, Reset Textures, or Reset Sounds.

Element Management (Right Panel):
Hover over the right edge of the screen to reveal the element control panel. Click the 'Add' button to add new elements (e.g., kill icons, subtitles) to the current preset. After adding, double-click the element preview or click the configure button to enter the element configuration screen. In the secondary tab, select a texture and drag your own PNG file or GIF animation directly into this window to customize textures. Click 'Configure Sound' to open the sound list, then click a sound row to enter the selection page; drag WAV/OGG files in that page to add custom audio and click Select to apply.
gd656killicon.client.gui.help.preset.tex: Switch texture source between custom, official, and vanilla. Drag-and-drop creates a new custom texture file, switches to custom mode, and keeps the original name for display.
gd656killicon.client.gui.help.preset.exp: Click 'Enter Preset Export Mode'. The preset ID button will change to 'Export'. Click it, enter a filename, and the current preset will be packaged into a .gdpack file. The file is saved in the 'config/gd656killicon/export' directory. Others can import it by simply dragging the file into the configuration interface.
gd656killicon.client.gui.help.preset.str:
A preset package (.gdpack) is essentially a ZIP archive. You can open it with an extraction tool to view its internal structure.

The package contains the following files:
- config.json (element configuration)
- textures folder (custom textures)
- sounds folder (custom sounds)

You can modify these files as needed, or replace them with your own files.
gd656killicon.client.gui.help.bonus.defa: Extra points triggered when specific conditions are met.
gd656killicon.bonus.DAMAGE.name: Damage Dealt
gd656killicon.bonus.DAMAGE.desc: Triggered when dealing damage to an entity.
gd656killicon.bonus.KILL.name: Kill
gd656killicon.bonus.KILL.desc: Triggered upon successfully killing an entity.
gd656killicon.bonus.EXPLOSION.name: Explosion Damage
gd656killicon.bonus.HEADSHOT.name: Headshot Damage
gd656killicon.bonus.HEADSHOT.desc: Damage hitting the head (requires headshot-supporting mods like TACZ or SBW).
gd656killicon.bonus.CRIT.name: Critical Damage
gd656killicon.bonus.KILL_EXPLOSION.name: Explosion Kill
gd656killicon.bonus.KILL_EXPLOSION.desc: Killing a target using explosive splash damage.
gd656killicon.bonus.KILL_HEADSHOT.name: Headshot Kill
gd656killicon.bonus.KILL_HEADSHOT.desc: Killing a target with a headshot (requires headshot-supporting mods like TACZ or SBW).
gd656killicon.bonus.KILL_CRIT.name: Critical Kill
gd656killicon.bonus.KILL_CRIT.desc: Killing a target with a critical hit.
gd656killicon.bonus.KILL_COMBO.name: Kill Combo
gd656killicon.bonus.KILL_COMBO.desc: Killing multiple targets in a short time (the 'short time' is determined by server config).
gd656killicon.bonus.KILL_LONG_DISTANCE.d: Killing a target from beyond 20 meters.
gd656killicon.bonus.KILL_INVISIBLE.name: Out of Sight
gd656killicon.bonus.KILL_INVISIBLE.desc: Killing a target that cannot be seen directly.
gd656killicon.bonus.ASSIST.name: Assist
gd656killicon.bonus.ASSIST.desc: Damaging a creature that dies due to other causes within 60 seconds.
gd656killicon.bonus.DESPERATE_COUNTERATT: Getting a kill while at critically low health (<= 4).
gd656killicon.bonus.AVENGE.name: Avenged
gd656killicon.bonus.AVENGE.desc: Killing the target that last killed you.
gd656killicon.bonus.SHOCKWAVE.name: Shockwave
gd656killicon.bonus.SHOCKWAVE.desc: Killing 5 or more targets with a single explosive blast.
gd656killicon.bonus.BLIND_KILL.name: Blindfire
gd656killicon.bonus.BLIND_KILL.desc: Getting a kill while blinded or vision-impaired (includes flashbangs from LR Tactical Workshop).
gd656killicon.bonus.BUFF_KILL.name: Buff Kill
gd656killicon.bonus.BUFF_KILL.desc: Getting a kill while under the effect of a buff.
gd656killicon.bonus.DEBUFF_KILL.name: Debuff Kill
gd656killicon.bonus.DEBUFF_KILL.desc: Getting a kill while under the effect of a debuff.
gd656killicon.bonus.BOTH_BUFF_DEBUFF_KIL: Getting a kill while under the effect of both a buff and a debuff.
gd656killicon.bonus.LAST_BULLET_KILL.des: Getting a kill with the last bullet in the magazine (TACZ guns only, does not trigger with SBW weapons).
gd656killicon.bonus.ONE_BULLET_MULTI_KIL: Killing two or more targets with a single bullet (works with weapons from multiple mods).
gd656killicon.bonus.EFFORTLESS_KILL.name: Effortless
gd656killicon.bonus.EFFORTLESS_KILL.desc: Getting a kill without taking any damage from the target.
gd656killicon.bonus.BACKSTAB_KILL.name: Back Attack
gd656killicon.bonus.BACKSTAB_KILL.desc: Attacking and killing a target from behind (regardless of distance).
Attacking and killing a target from behind (distance approximately less than two meters).
gd656killicon.bonus.BRAVE_RETURN.name: Brave Return
gd656killicon.bonus.BRAVE_RETURN.desc: Getting a kill after a series of consecutive deaths.
gd656killicon.bonus.JUSTICE_FROM_ABOVE.d: Killing a target while falling from a height.
gd656killicon.bonus.ABSOLUTE_AIR_CONTROL: Killing ground or air units while flying with an Elytra.
gd656killicon.bonus.BERSERKER.name: Berserker
gd656killicon.bonus.BERSERKER.desc: Dealing massive damage or getting multiple kills in a short time.
gd656killicon.bonus.INTERRUPTED_STREAK.d: Killing a player who is on a kill streak (streak approximately >= 5).
gd656killicon.bonus.LEAVE_IT_TO_ME.name: Leave it to Me
gd656killicon.bonus.LEAVE_IT_TO_ME.desc: Killing a creature or player that killed a teammate.
gd656killicon.bonus.SAVIOR.name: Savior
gd656killicon.bonus.SAVIOR.desc: Killing an enemy that is attacking a teammate.
gd656killicon.bonus.SLAY_THE_LEADER.name: Slay the Leader
gd656killicon.bonus.SLAY_THE_LEADER.desc: Killing the player with the highest current score.
gd656killicon.bonus.PURGE.name: Purge
gd656killicon.bonus.QUICK_SWITCH.name: Quick Switch
gd656killicon.bonus.QUICK_SWITCH.desc: Getting a kill immediately after switching weapons.
gd656killicon.bonus.SEIZE_OPPORTUNITY.de: Getting a kill while the target is under a negative status effect.
gd656killicon.bonus.BLOODTHIRSTY.name: Bloodthirsty
gd656killicon.bonus.MERCILESS.name: Merciless
gd656killicon.bonus.VALIANT.name: Valiant
gd656killicon.bonus.FIERCE.name: Fierce
gd656killicon.bonus.SAVAGE.name: Savage
gd656killicon.bonus.POTATO_AIM.name: Potato Aim
gd656killicon.bonus.POTATO_AIM.desc: Getting a kill after three assists.
gd656killicon.bonus.LOCKED_TARGET.name: Locked Target
gd656killicon.bonus.LOCKED_TARGET.desc: Engaging the same target for a period and then getting the kill.
gd656killicon.bonus.HOLD_POSITION.name: Hold Position
gd656killicon.bonus.HOLD_POSITION.desc: Getting a kill while moving less than 2 blocks from the point of first damage to the kill.
gd656killicon.bonus.CHARGE_ASSAULT.name: Charge Assault
gd656killicon.bonus.CHARGE_ASSAULT.desc: Triggered after sprinting a cumulative distance of 200 meters.
gd656killicon.bonus.FIRE_SUPPRESSION.des: Firing TACZ guns such that bullet paths pass within 2 meters of non-teammate creatures 15 times.
gd656killicon.bonus.DESTROY_BLOCK.name: Destroy Prop
gd656killicon.bonus.DESTROY_BLOCK.desc: Triggered upon destroying a block (includes player mining and projectile destruction).
gd656killicon.bonus.HIT_VEHICLE_ARMOR.de: Damaging a vehicle (requires SBW vehicles, YWZJ vehicles, or IA Immersive Aircraft mod).
gd656killicon.bonus.DESTROY_VEHICLE.name: Armor Destroyed
gd656killicon.bonus.DESTROY_VEHICLE.desc: Completely destroying an enemy vehicle (requires SBW vehicles, YWZJ vehicles, or IA Immersive Aircraft mod).
gd656killicon.bonus.VEHICLE_REPAIR.name: Vehicle Repair
gd656killicon.bonus.VEHICLE_REPAIR.desc: Repairing a friendly vehicle (requires SBW vehicles, YWZJ vehicles, or IA Immersive Aircraft mod).
gd656killicon.bonus.VALUE_TARGET_DESTROY: Destroying a high-value target (targets gain value based on damage dealt by them) (requires SBW or YWZJ vehicles).
gd656killicon.bonus.SPOTTING.name: Spotting
gd656killicon.bonus.SPOTTING.desc: Triggered upon successfully marking a target, max twice per minute.
gd656killicon.bonus.SPOTTING_KILL.name: Marked Kill
gd656killicon.bonus.SPOTTING_KILL.desc: Killing a target that you marked yourself.
gd656killicon.bonus.SPOTTING_TEAM_ASSIST: A teammate kills a target that you marked.
